sentences.sentence: A referendum to authorise renegotiations would have been risky too (Mr Cameron would have been seriously emasculated if the negotiations failed).
sentences.translation: 就重新谈判进行公投同样有风险(倘若谈判失败，卡梅伦则会陷入窘境)。

sentences.sentence: Thee referendum date announcement comes after renegotiations on the UK's relationship with Europe were finalised on Friday night after intense wrangling at a two-day summit in Brussels.
sentences.translation: 公投日期宣布前，布鲁塞尔召开了为期两天的峰会，会上有激烈的争论，最终在周五就英国在欧盟的的“特殊地位”达成一致协议。
